Action.author: gennadyl
Action.body: The problem is publishing result jars to hyperledger maven repository. This should be addresses during FABCI-50

Action.author: sambhavdutt
Action.body: This issue has been resolved in FABCI-50 and the shim error is not observed from several builds.
